item.title: SCMP Social Network Analysis
item.description: Introduction In this project we analyzed the Twitter data from South China Morning Post with the goal to understand its Social Network on Twitter. Our goal was to understand how the Twitter Users on SCMPâ€™s account behave and then find opportunities that SCMP can capitalize on. This project was developed as part of Social Media Course grading at Business Analytics Master Course at Hong Kong University.
